text: Luis Fernando Díaz Marulanda (born 13 January 1997) is a Colombian professional footballer. He plays for Premier League club Liverpool. and the Colombia national football team. He plays as Forward. He was born in Barrancas, La Guajira. He is one of the best forwards in Latin America, starting in Liverpool and Colombia before his injury. Category:Colombian footballers Category:1997 births
title: Luis Díaz (footballer, born 1997)
